subject: Re: [junit] Help requested: updating javadoc for junit.framework classes
msgSnippet: Malte, Good question.  I think it s answered in the discussion currently going on in the bug.  If not, can you ask again there?  Thanks, David On Wed, Aug 15,
messageBody:
Malte,

Good question. I think it's answered in the discussion currently going on
in the bug. If not, can you ask again there? Thanks,

David
